Uses of Class
Book

    • Uses of Book in <Unnamed>

      Methods in <Unnamed> that return Book 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Book BookRepository.getBookByAuthorAndName(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String author)
      returns back a unique book by the combination of the book's title and author which uniquely identify the book in our database
      Methods in <Unnamed> that return types with arguments of type Book 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Book> BookRepository.getAllBooksInLibrary() 
      java.util.ArrayList<Book> MemberRepository.getBorrowedBooks(java.lang.String email)
      given the email of the user we get all the books that he already has in the current time
      java.util.ArrayList<Book> BookRepository.searchForABook(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String author, java.lang.String category)
      this method search for a book in the db by using one or more of those title author or category and if all are empty values it returns all the book in the db
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Book 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean BookRepository.borrowBook(Member borrower, Book borrowedBook)
      this method takes a book and a member inserts entry in the transactions/borrows table in the database to commit it
      boolean BookRepository.checkIfAlreadyHasACopy(Member borrower, Book borrowedBook)
      this method checks if the member/borrower has already a copy of a given book to make sure that he doesn't take more than one copy (library policy)
      void BookRepository.decrementCopiesOfBook(Book book)
      this method takes a certain book and update its entry by increasing its number of copies after a member borrows a book
      void BookRepository.incrementCopiesOfBook(Book book)
      this method takes a certain book and update its entry by increasing its number of copies after a member returns a book
      boolean BookRepository.registerNewBookInLibrary(Book book)
      takes object Book with all its info and inserts it into our database
      boolean BookRepository.returnBook(Member borrower, Book borrowedBook)
      this method completes the process of a member returning a book to db by deactivating the entry in the table
